title: What font is this?
content:
Not sure if this is an existing typeface or specialized. Anyone know?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080129100022im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/BroomfieldFont_6178.jpg)

 [‹ heres another one...does anyone recognise this????](http://web.archive.org/web/20080129100022/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40743 "Go to previous forum topic") [Script font found on the label of an Herzegovian wine ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080129100022/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40740 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Mercster

comments.content: I think someone has tacked on slabs to Frutiger or Myriad.
and, they really, really shouldn’t have.
